alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange County through 245 PM EDT... At 204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Windsor, or near West Point, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Monroe, Walden, West Point, New Windsor, Gardnertown, Montgomery, Harriman, Kiryas Joel, Woodbury, Orange Lake, Washingtonville, Firthcliffe, Vails Gate and Balmville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
